title: Danny Rose gives Mauricio Pochettino food for thought after organising team-bonding meal
text:
Danny Rose was one of the players who took the lead in planning the team-bonding meal Mauricio Pochettino hopes will help kick-start their season.

Manager Pochettino and his coaching staff were invited out by the players to Mayfair restaurant Novikov on Thursday as a show of support after the club’s poor start to the campaign.

Sportsmail understands Rose took a prominent role in organising the evening. Rose almost left Spurs in the summer but he remains a key figure on and off the pitch.

Danny Rose was one of the players who took the lead in planning a Tottenham team meal

Pochettino hopes the dinner will provide the morale boost his side need to get back on track. ‘It was very good, it was very nice, very kind of them to invite the coaching staff,’ said the Argentine.

‘It was busy. We spent a few hours there and it is always nice to see people in a different environment.

‘It is going to help in the long-term. You cannot measure how much it will help, 20 per cent, 30 per cent. In the dynamic of the group, this team bonding, for different players or the new players, makes the group stronger.’
description: EXCLUSIVE: Danny Rose was one of the players who took the lead in planning the team-bonding meal Mauricio Pochettino hopes will help kick-start their season.
authors: Adrian Kajumba For The Daily Mail
